modName: How to Replace Bethesa Logo and Main Menu Music
summary: Tired of seeing the Bethesda logo every time you load up Skyrim? Tired of hearing the same menu music as well? I'll show you how to rectify that.
descriptionHtml:
I'd seen plenty of mods that just offer replacements to download, but since I don't care much for that I figured I'd just make a video to show you guys how to change this stuff yourself.

[youtube]kWIGNWFF7nQ[/youtube]
author: Joseph Sheldahl
